QuestData.Title: They Stole Excaliberto!
QuestData.Description: I was scouting the nearby demon village when I was attacked. They took my artifact! Of course, if I leave here, the shore will be undefended. The nearby demons have it. Go, slay them and bring it back to me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Excaliberto and return it to Maximillian.
